title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 457.1 - Late payment charge policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 457.1 - Late payment charge policy

State Regulations

Any municipal or rural electric cooperative system in the

State of New York which purchases power from the Power Authority may elect to
impose a late payment charge, of a continuing interest type, because of the
failure of any retail customer to pay a bill for electric service within a
specified period therein stated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
457.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
